hydrate.title: Hydration Hero
hydrate.description: Log 8+ glasses of water for 3 days in a row.

earlyBird.title: Early Bird
earlyBird.description: Eat breakfast before 9 AM for 3 days.

rainbow.title: Eat the Rainbow
rainbow.description: Log at least 4 different vegetables in one week.

protein: A pre-made protein shake is a lifesaver on busy mornings!
I started adding a scoop of unflavored collagen peptides to my coffee. It's an easy protein boost!
Greek yogurt has been a game-changer for my afternoon snacks. It's packed with protein.
vegetables: I chop up a bunch of veggies on Sunday so they're ready to toss into salads or stir-fries all week.
Frozen vegetables are just as nutritious as fresh ones and they never go bad!
I started adding spinach to my fruit smoothies. You can't even taste it!
water: I bought a fun water bottle with time markers on it. It sounds silly, but it really helps!
I set a recurring reminder on my phone to drink a glass of water every hour.
Herbal tea counts towards your water goal! I love a cup of peppermint tea in the afternoon.
general: Don't aim for perfection! Just focus on making one small, healthy choice at a time.
I found that planning my meals for just the next 3 days felt much less overwhelming than a full week.
